website_summaries.verdict: The customer service for this company goes above and beyond and its product is effective as well.
pros: The pump dispenser is efficiently designed to release a personalized amount of required gel depending on pressure applied plus the lid is easy to remove if you want to access every drop
cons: For some, it produces a stinging sensation around their eyes

customer_reviews.title: The Best! Really works!
customer_reviews.text: Feels cool when applied. It is lightweight and makes my skin look and feel less tired. You can smell the cucumbers. My eyes are less puffy and the skin around my eyes look and feel firmer. I use it on my forehead and between my eyes as well. I have noticed the lines between my eyes and on my forehead have softened and the skin looks and feels firmer. I use this eye gel in the morning and evening. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: It did nothing for me. I gave it a few weeks, and I was unimpressed. (I do use the TruSkin Naturals Vitamin C Serum for Face, Facial Serum with Hyaluronic Acid and THAT I love!) For me, Best eye Gel for Wrinkles was a waste of money. Unfortunately, I would not recommend this product. EDIT: I will say that the contacted me and made every effort to correct the problem. Not only was the customer stellar and attentive to the review, they recommend another product (and sent a complimentary bottle, just received yesterday) and they issued a refund for the product that didn't work. I give them 5 stars just for amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Lela

customer_reviews.title: Wow it just got even better!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for a long time, it's wonderful. The new packaging is a dream- larger size, you now just need to press the top down and it pumps out the perfect amount of cream, and I don't have to buy it as often. It made me love it even more! It's so nice to find a product that works, I'm so glad I found this. Lifetime customer!
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: TruSkin Products are Amazing
customer_reviews.text: We love TruSkin products! My younger sister and I started using TruSkin's Vitamin C-Plus Super Serum and then their Vitamin C Moisturizer. We love them both and definitely see a difference in our skin. I'm 67 and my sister is 59. We recently started using their Eye Gel in the new packaging and love it, we dabbed it around our eyes and other areas on our face and it is amazing. Our eyes look refreshed, our top eyelids are firm, and under our eyes are brightened. We both feel we can go out now without wearing foundation. I can't wait to try TruSkin's cleanser. Thank you TruSkin!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is comparable to much more expensive products
customer_reviews.text: I've used TruSkin Naturals products for over a year, and I have to say I love them all. This eye gel is comparable to a much more expensive gel from a direct sales company-- at about 1/3 the price. I team this item with the HA and Retinol serums, along with the C plus super serum. I also use the Vitamin C and Retinol daily moisturizer. Customer service is always excellent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Bye-bye dark circles.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to write a review for this product until I gave it time to work. It works! I’ve had dark circles under my eyes for more years than I want to admit and have tried every product that claims to improve the appearance of dark circles, only to be disappointed. I use this gel most mornings after washing my face but never miss a night time application. My dark circles have improved to the point that I can go makeup free without feeling self conscious and wrinkles have diminished greatly.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperBee

customer_reviews.title: It does actually work
customer_reviews.text: I was actually scanning moisturizers for myself when I stumbled upon this. My husband has visible bags under his eyes so we thought we’d give it a try. As you can see from the picture, it works pretty darn well. This was after three days of use. He puts a little bit on in the morning and a little bit on at night. I do find its most noticeable shortly after he uses it. Over the course of the day the puffiness does tend to re-emerge. But, for the price, it does a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: WamQQk

customer_reviews.title: Eye cream
customer_reviews.text: I'm 67 and my eyes have puffy bags on the lids in the inside corner & the bottom of my eye. It showed up in pictures so badly that it made me look older than my 91 year old mother!! The reviews on this cream were pretty good, but when people don't reveal their age, etc., it doesn't help to imagine. This eye cream is working pretty well. As a matter of fact, it seems like the bags are less noticeable even before I use the cream in the morning. I hope it keeps working like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hanlon

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, bigger container that lasts much longer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the new, bigger size of TruSkin's eye gel. It's VERY good at reducing puffiness, and pretty good with dark circles (nothing works for me on my 63-year-old dark teacher's circles that doesn't also give me a sinus infection--probably due to my thin, fine skin). Also, it doesn't conflict with TruSkin's moisturizer--some eye products really sting when combined with the "wrong" moisturizer. I do wish the dispenser's opening was a bit smaller so the amount that comes out is less--this stuff nicely covers in small amounts. But I've learned to not press so hard and get the amount I prefer. I have pretty sensitive skin and TruSkin's products have never bothered me!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah M. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Love TruSkin
customer_reviews.text: Not really sold on it helping with "wrinkles, dark Circles, puffiness and bags," but it moisturizes my eye area pretty well (I have not done before/after photos either). I'll occasionally use it all over my face when in a rush. I do like the way this dispenses and I love the TruSkin product line. I currently use their HA serum (which has significantly decreased my cystic acne and break outs) and Vitamin C serum to help with melasma.
customer_reviews.author: It'sMe

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand/company and the Cofounder
customer_reviews.text: First, I love this brand/company and the Cofounder, Erica. She is amazing and the best when it comes to Customer Support. Just purchased their new Eye Gel. So far, so good. It's only been a week. I love the subtle cucumber smell, the pump jar that it comes in, and how it absorbs cleanly into the skin. And for the price, it's a good size jar. I use their facial cleaner, toner, c-serum, eye gel, moisturizer & finish w/ their Rose mist toner... all in that order, morning and night. And once a week I use a micro 540 needle derma roller on my face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G.

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: I have tried soooo many eye preparations out there. Garnier in the red jar, Cerave, Roc, Burt's Bees, you name it. My two primary criteria are hydration and gentleness. This is very gentle and does not irritate my eye area at all. Could be a tad more hydrating, but overall it works well. Does not interfere with makeup, reduces lines. I use it first thing in the morning out of the shower. I don't have dark circles or puffiness, just fine lines. This smooths them out somewhat. Look, there is no eye cream will significantly turn back the clock, you need cosmetic intervention for that. But a good eye cream will make you look more rested. This gel does that.
customer_reviews.author: Techblukat

customer_reviews.title: Eye Gel stings and burns, skin around my eyes felt dry
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally purchased two TruSkin Eye Gels. I opened the first jar and used it as directed. I had an immediate burning feeling, which was quite uncomfortable. I also thought my eye area felt dry instead of moisturized. Guess I should have returned both of them but it's just too much trouble to pack it all up and pay postage, etc., so I'll take the loss on this one. I do use the TruSkin Vitamin C Serum and the moisturizer and love them both and will be reordering soon. Just can't tolerate the eye gel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: I'm not 100% sure (am I expecting to look better or is it real? :) but this seems to work over a little time. I bought this because it said "dark Circles" and we all know nothing works with them but I think it may have helped a little. It also seems to slightly diminish sun damage spots. At first I was using it nightly then I cut back to 3-4 times a week. I pair it with the VitC moisturizer before bed. I think I look better and I guess thats what counts. I would not call this a moisturizer but maybe more a serum/treatment. I'm happy with it and would reorder - reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this, great and fresh smelling. Tightening without feeling too tight. I use mine all over the face. It takes my crows feet right away!
customer_reviews.author: Tabiatha

customer_reviews.title: Tightens hooded eyes
customer_reviews.text: This formula is exactly what an eye cream should be. Less than a week after applying to my eye area I immediately felt my skin tightening. I have hooded eyes but they started tightening up which opened my eyes more than before. I also apply to my smile creases and they have disappeared. Theres a lot of product in the jar so this will definitely last for a long time. I have not experienced any skin irritations or reactions to any of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye gel, at a GREAT PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: A friend told me about this, and this is my fifth jar! It's gentle, no smell, and easy to use. You can use this ABOVE your eyes, too, and , of course, at bedtime, with no problems. I use it right before bed, and first thing in the AM. You should know: When it stops coming out the little hole in the top, there's still OODLES of it, left in the jar, so open up the lid, to use it. My only other complaint is that the plastic top is not strong, Most of the time, it ends up cracked, if you drop it. STILL a great product, though...Just needs new packaging...Which I think it now HAS!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this product numerous times from TruSkin Naturals. I love it. It feels so good going on and really works around the eyes. This is a new dispenser and larger size than I've previously purchased and I love that too! Keep up the great work and customer service, TruSkin Naturals!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith L. Voss

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work for puffy eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product, for many months, to get rid of that puffy eye look. I still have it. It was a waste of money. After making this post, I heard from the company which really stands behind it's products. They refunded the money I spent on the eye gel and are in the process of sending me a product that they think I'll like for puffy eyes. They e-mailed instructions, in advance, of how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Sticky, slow to dry, but nice once it's dry.
customer_reviews.text: Let's start with the dispenser. Excellent idea, meh on execution. The product remains sticky even after an hour,, this is with the tiniest amount. When doing morning work prep, I need an eye cream that will dry down quickly so makeup can follow. I can't do that with this. Back to the dispenser, I can see having to open it up and dig out the majority of the product with a makeup spatula due to the consistency of the product. Back to the product, once it finally dries...lovely, smooth and velvety. This is why I'll keep it, night time moisturizer. Reorder is still in question.
customer_reviews.author: Kilde: it's like "tilde" with a K.

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff in this jar!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very choosy about what I put on my face due to sensitive skin issues. I highly recommend TruSkin Eye Gel for its long list of ingredients that are truly beneficial to all skin types. It’s hard to find all these ingredients in one product and for a reasonable price to boot. I use it on my neck, around my mouth and of course, around my eyes. I apply morning and night, and in the winter, I follow with a light moisturizer after letting the gel sink in for a minute. Ladies, this is definitely worth trying!
customer_reviews.author: tooth fairy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product - Amazing Price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using TruSkin Eye Gel for about 2.5 months now and I absolutely love this product. I have noticed a major difference in my dark circles, and crows feet. My whole under-eye area appears brighter, and looks younger! I have started putting this product on my forehead and have noticed a slight decrease in the deep wrinkles there as well. I highly recommend this product, be patient, don't give up, the results will not happen over night. One day you will be putting your make-up on and you'll finally notice the change, and then you'll kiss the jar for working miracles!
customer_reviews.author: K_K_31415

customer_reviews.title: Love TruSkin Products!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 44 and have tried all sorts of anti-aging facial care products over the years. Now that I found TruSkin I no longer have to continue spending my hard earned money experimenting with products that may or may not show results. I live in a dry desert climate so my skin requires lots of moisture. The eye gel works amazingly well, I couldn’t be happier with the results. Even my MedSpa nurse comments on how healthy my skin looks and feels. I’m self consciensous about the wrinkles under my eyes and TruSkin eye gel has softened the fine lines under my eyes. I definitely feel better when I look in the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I used the cream for about 6 weeks, my undereyes appeared more dry and more noticeable lines appeared. Unfortunately, I will not be using this anymore. I have been in contact with TruSkin via email in the last couple of days and altough I do stand by my review above, they offered me a full refund for the product, proving that they stand by their customer satisfaction guarantee. They also provided recommendations for my skincare concerns. Although this particular product did not work for me, TruSkin has great customer service and their Vitamin C Serum is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mtz Saucedo

customer_reviews.title: THE COMPANY SETS A HIGH STANDARD FOR CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: This may not be for everyone and should be approached cautiously despite it containing seemingly harmless ingredients. I had a moderate local reaction which I suspect may have been due to my unique sensitivity toward the Sodium Benzoate preservative in the product but I would not let my single experience discourage future users from buying the product. The company, by the way, was extremely responsive and attentive toward my comments. Customer service seems to be their number one product!
customer_reviews.author: Frank M. Buselli

customer_reviews.title: Love this eye gel, and  TruSkin’s products!!
customer_reviews.text: TruSkin makes great products. I use 4 right now. I haven’t seen too much improvement in my dark circles and puffiness. But in all fairness I have poor functioning Kidneys. So nothing may help. Thru appeared in my mid-60’s when functionality decreases. The eye gel goes on smoothly and feels wonderful. I haven’t been using it long enough to give a fair evaluation. Everything moves slower for us mature people. But I love the Vitamin C, there retinol, and this gel for its soothing ability.
customer_reviews.author: charley erdman

customer_reviews.title: I really loved their vitamin C serum
customer_reviews.text: I really loved their vitamin C serum, but don't feel like the eye gel really does anything. I think they have good products, just don't love this one. *Update: The company did contact me and go above and beyond to make sure I was satisfied. I'm very impressed with this company and the way they treat their customers! I have been very pleased with their other products and they are extremely helpful with finding products that are best for you as an individual!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great under makeup
customer_reviews.text: I needed an eye cream that would not irritate my eyes. Having used TruSkin Vitamin C serum for a couple of year, I decided to try their other products. This is the best eye cream I’ve ever purchased. It feels great; works well under makeup. It has a unique pump, and a generous amount of the product unlike many eye creams that are languishing in my bathroom cabinet. Plus the company’s customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie R. Barbarito

customer_reviews.title: almost like I'm try to glue the skin so it's stretched ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a month and it seems to be working well. I definitely noticed some eye puffiness went away and I think this is a big part of it. It does sometimes feel sticky, almost like I'm try to glue the skin so it's stretched and wrinkles are less obvious. There was one fine line in particular I was hoping would disappear but it seems like it's here to stay. My husband has started to use it and likes it as well, so I think it's a great buy. However, I might buy something else when this is empty to keep whatever I use effective.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how effective this product was until I ran out of it. It has the consistency of aloe, but isn't sticky like aloe. It reduced under eye puffiness and dark circles over time rather than an immediate tightening as with some products. I also liked it very much as a light weight whole face moisturizer. And the customer service has been excellent. I emailed the company with questions about other products and received an immediate and lengthy informative response. I have just reordered! I plan to try the whole product line. I have used organic and natural products exclusively for at least 15 years. It's a relief to find this type of line at such reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.author: Discriminating Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: This company's products are very good. My wife has always been very pleased, and I (I typically am a rough-it sort of guy) have to say that the items I have tried are really very effective. If you are considering buying a product of theirs, do so with confidence. Also, customer service always follows up on their products so that you feel you really do have someone who cares about you. Nice find!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't work for me, as I must have had an allergic reaction. I was hopeful it would. The bottle is great and product was easy to dispense. Tru Skin reached out to me and wanted to find out why I was dissatisfied. I told them the situation and they were super helpful. They offered me another product in their line to try. Very caring and amazing customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Tru skin eye gel review
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes it would help with the dark circles under my eyes. I’m three weeks into using it and it has helped with the puffiness under my eyes but I haven’t seen any difference with the darkness under my eyes. It does work well for moisturizing your skin without leaving a greasy feel after applying it. However, I wish there was a way that you could actually see how much is actually left in jar when your using it. The jar is white and you can’t tell how much is left. Overall, it’s definitely worth the money and I will definitely purchase another one when this one ends.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: It's still working!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the gel a little over a month ago. After using it religiously every day, twice a day, I did notice my dark corners lighten a bit. I probably need to use it a little longer before being able to tell a drastic difference, but it's doing something. I'll also say, their customer service is excellent! They helped me with my skin issues and were able to make recommendations for my skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Hallock

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I been using this eye cream and vitamin c serum and face moisturizer for 2 weeks , I started seeing results after a week my eyes were less puffy and the bags really was receding and after the 2 second week the dark circle around my eyes are almost gone . Really glad I purchased this cream. My skin color has improved and my skin is smooth and hydrated.will be trying other products.
customer_reviews.author: sharon Word

customer_reviews.title: It works for this old(ish) guy.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for over a year. As a 53 year old man it if he only"beauty regimen" I indulge in. Due to a type 2 pre diabetic condition and severe allergies, I often wake to raccoon staring back it me in the mirror. Some dabs of this and I'm right as rain. One days I forget, my coworkers ask me if I've been partying all night!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Susan K

customer_reviews.title: Good  Eye Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this product feels on my eye area but I have to be very careful not to get it in my eyes because it can be very irritating. I think that I must rub my eyes a lot and perhaps this is how it gets in my eyes. I have only been using a short time but do like how my eyes look after it is applied.
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Eye Gel
customer_reviews.text: I'm 24 and my main purpose in using this eye gel is to reduce the effects of aging, so after two weeks it's much too early to tell whether that's working. But you only need to use a tiny bit (half a pea size) so I think it's affordable; I like the dispenser; it has a pleasant texture, smooth and slightly sticky; it gently hydrates the skin around my eyes and it has not caused any irritation. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy B.

customer_reviews.title: Just order it! :)
customer_reviews.text: My eye area is so much fuller! It is like they took a big drink. I love the cooling and fullness that I get from this product. I have not had any under eye darkness. I look more awake, and even my clients at work said something. I wake up at 4:30 every morning and sometimes do not get home until 9 P.M. At 36, I am fighting to hang on to my youth. I klove how sanitary the container is. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Jen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eye gel. It firms and brightens my eyes. It feels and smells so good. I was a Mary Kay user for years and I am so happy to have found a line of products that work better and have much better ingredients. I have psoriasis in my hair line and finding facial products that work but don't irritate my condition has been challenging. Truskin naturals has solved that problem for me and I am truly grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Botox
customer_reviews.text: I’m a female in her 60s. Since I have been using Truskin products I have the softest, healthiest, and almost wrinkle free face. I have had people ask if I have had Botox for my forehead and for my crows feet. I happily tell them no.....I use Truskin.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Harris

customer_reviews.title: Super Cream!
customer_reviews.text: Great gel w/handy container. Very easy to use with new pump container....product is not constantly exposed to air b/c of the unique dispenser. I love everything from TruSkin! I am 51 and have seen improvements after using their products. I've tried every expensive skin care product and this works better!
customer_reviews.author: stownse

customer_reviews.title: Just pure hydration
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel. We(my bf and I) feel that it leaves our eyes, fresh, soft, radiant, we have seen differences in our lashes(longer and thicker). But we haven't seen any difference with dark circles, it hasn't lightened or brightened or dark circles. This is great if you want hydration, freshness, dewy finish.
customer_reviews.author: steven morales

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this product...cooling effect is nice, but no change to wrinkles or dark circles. Using day and night for about 2 weeks.Vitamin C serum is very good though.
customer_reviews.author: michelle briggs

customer_reviews.title: I felt like it wasn't doing anything for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for the texture. I felt like it wasn't doing anything for me. I got it after having bought some of Tru Skins serums that I like very much. The company is working with me to help me find an eye cream I like.They are very 'hands on' and helpful
customer_reviews.author: Bj Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Did not help my dark circles.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product twice a day. Once in the morning & once in the evening(before bed). I did this regimen for an entire month, I can honestly say it did not help my dark eye circles at all. My wife & I did not notice any difference after 2 weeks, however i continued to use the cream for 2 more weeks. This is the 4th product Ive used to try to reduce the darkness of my eyes, with no luck. Maybe this company has another product they would recommend me to try. This was definitely money wasted for me!
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: I like the gel consistency but the container is hard to use. You have to be creative to get less that the glob that comes out as a dose.... I haven't seen any results after 2 months of using it but it goes on smooth. Update: The company contacted me and went above and beyond to make sure I was satisfied. I have purchased many products from TruSkin Naturals and have been extremely happy. They are the only products that I will use on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: TxBpo

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This producr actually works. I've always had problems with dark circles under my eyes, if yoy use this everyday for a week, you WILL see a difference. It can be a little tacky to the touch, but i use it before bed so it dowsnt bother me. I will order another jar when this one is almost finished.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: Initially this did absolutely nothing for me after 3 weeks. Then,one day, I noticed a tiny bit of change. Under my eyes were not so dark.I think that genetics has a lot to do with the results as well as how long those dark circles have been there. I'm still using it and going to keep on using it. If you're reading this, just try it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat lover

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of "large size" packaging
customer_reviews.text: First, this eye gel is excellent(I am mid-50's yo woman, living in the dray air land of SoCal) and I find it really makes a difference. Next, let me say, TruSkin REALLY stands behind their products 100%! Lastly the smaller size packing is excellent! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: CandyLZ

customer_reviews.title: Finally an eye gel that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. It's very effective and lives up to the description that the seller posts. Not to mention, you don't need to wait weeks to see the results. The results are noticeable after about a week. I have tried to many eye creams, gels and lotions and some at a much higher price. Finally one that works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Olga harris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product! Glides on like silk and my eyes look better already; I will definitely buy more of this when I've finished the jar. It's important to me that it's NOT tested on animals, and the ingredients are natural botanicals. Mother earth really is the best pharmacy! I great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Linn M.S. Ed.

customer_reviews.title: Just try it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff lasts FOREVER!!! I bought it in May before my sister's wedding and it is now the last week of September!!! With no signs of it being empty anytime soon! (And I'm heavy handed with products) My eyes just feel and look refreshed and awake and bright when I use this! I have acne prone skin and this stuff has not made me break out like other eye creams and gels have. Even when I use it two times daily. Great stuff!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Niknak

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed... Missing Product in Jar ...Open Bottle.
customer_reviews.text: The product opens.... It’s not airtight and it looks like half the product is missing... I’m disappointed. I was so excited to get this item because of the reviews. It has a lot of ingredients that my expensive eye cream does but I guess you get what you pay for. 10/18/20 UPDATE: Company did reach out to me and replaced the item And refunded me my purchase as well.
customer_reviews.author: David Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few weeks and love it. It moisturizes well and tightens/firms the skin around my eyes. I have allergies and sometimes my eyes get itchy and swell up. If I use this eye cream, it keeps the swelling and puffiness down. I am certain this will help my anti-aging efforts!
customer_reviews.author: L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SO FAR!
customer_reviews.text: I love the moist and gentle tightening effect this gives my face. I hope it is accumulative so I'd be a customer for life! Great dispenser too. No product is wasted when it gets down to the last dollop.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that goes on smoothly and clearly so it does not show. Pump is fantastic so that you do not touch or open the entire product to contamination but just release enough to use. Works on puffiness under the eye. Great customer service and follow up with how product is working. Real concern for how they can help my face and neck issues.
customer_reviews.author: BIK

customer_reviews.title: Save your money did not work
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product three times a day for over a month and I have seen not much change at all I do not believe that this product works at least it did not work for me I bought another one by Kiehl's and I've been using it for a week and I could already see a difference waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Teddy a.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it moisturizes without leaving the skin around your eye oily where your eye makeup runs. It truly hydrates and moisturizes leaving a natural look and feel without the shine. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye gel. Ive been using rodan and fields for years, and their eye cream could not do in a year what this product has done in a few months. Im 41, so the lines were starting to show around my eyes, key words are were starting to dhow, they have improved. I use it every morning and night and even use a little on my neck...it helped with the lines there too. I LOVE this stuff and want to buy it in stock. The only reget is all of the money I wasted on other products that cost me twice as much and did nothing. Im so happy I found this stuff 😊😊
customer_reviews.author: D Herbermann

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work at all for me. I wasn’t expecting a miracle cream but it just didn’t help the slightest bit. UPDATE: even though this product didn’t work for me personally the company contacted me offering me a refund for my purchase. They also suggested another product that might be a better fit for my personal needs and even offered to send it to me for free to try out. All I can say is they have amazing customer service and do to that fact I would definitely be open to trying out other products in their line to see what works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Rotto

customer_reviews.title: Fixes the dark circles and bags under my eyes!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I use it right after the Vitamin C serum each night and each morning. I swear by it now! I look younger and feel so much more confident! I’ve been using it for almost a month and the results have been astonishing! Such a great investment for both products! I’m 28 and have aged quite a bit under the eyes due to genetics and cigarette smoking... This stuff is a miracle elixer! The customer service is fantastic too!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eye gel. It works great! It is easy to dispense and it feels silky smooth. I have noticed a definite improvement in the fine lines around my eyes. My eyes look refreshed and bright even when I didn't get enough beauty rest the night before. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K Core

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for 3 weeks, hoping for a little tightening on the eyelids. I think it’s helping a bit. I use this all over my face and it’s a great sub for a face serum.
customer_reviews.author: Joniah

customer_reviews.title: Under Eye Circles/Bags Have Disappeared
customer_reviews.text: I'm OBSESSED. So I'm 30 and starting to deal with the bags/dark circles under my eyes. I bought this eye gel and after a few weeks, the bags/dark circles started to disappear. I put a little on right under my eyes at night and in the morning, and my skin feels softer and smoother. Would definitely recommend to anyone dealing with those issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: STILL HAVE PUFFINESS UNDER MY EYES IN THE MORNING
customer_reviews.text: DIDN'T CAUSE ANY ADVERSE REACTION BUT IT DIDN'T DO ANYTHING THAT WASHING MY FACE WELL WITH WARM WATER DOESN'T DO.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Minimized crow’s feet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a couple of weeks now, daily. I noticed yesterday that my crow’s feet have faded! I’m extremely happy with this, as I was considering a filler.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal P

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m getting small boils around my eye after using this for a few months now. The company however has been amazing and reached out to me with an alternate product to help
customer_reviews.author: DSN

customer_reviews.title: Light and hydrating- awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this company's products - I have always had great experiences with them, they follow up when they send you products and they have great sales! Fantastic customer service :) This eye gel can be used under makeup without causing eye makeup to shift and it can actually be used all over the face as extra hydration. I highly recommend it! Thank you TruSkin!
customer_reviews.author: Gina R. Farrar

customer_reviews.title: Helps Dark circles and crows feet
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I thought I would try some expensive network marketing skincare products and find a miracle, but before I used all of the expensive product I re-ordered my favorite! I actually feel like the skin around my eyes digressed while I was not using this product! In the winter it also keeps the eye area hydrated. Don’t expect that it will correct what has already happened, but it will keep it from happening sooner! Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Good Results, Good Company!
customer_reviews.text: "I am well pleased with my purchase of the Trueskin Natural Eye Gel, I am very satisfied with my seller experience this company really cares about their customer experience with using their product. Since using this eye gel I've seen good results such as more firmness and brightness around the eye area. I just purchased a new jar. Miss Glo
customer_reviews.author: Miss G.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this eye cream. I really like the TruSkin brand and use their serums every day. I'm 62 and struggle with dark circles under my eyes. I've been using this product for a couple of weeks and I do notice an improvement already, I also really like the fact that you can dispense the cream without having to dip your finger in a jar, thereby contaminating the contents.
customer_reviews.author: JodyM

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy use jar for application. Goes on easy and product feels great. Not sure how it would work under concealor tho- as it could “ball up”
customer_reviews.author: Jason Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for temp fix for undereye bags
customer_reviews.text: I may be wrong, but I believe this product has a skin tightening ingredient that temporarily tightens up the area under one's eyes, for a day, until the product is washed off. I believe that it also has ingredients that are absorbed by the skin, and may eventually tighten the skin more permanently, as it claims to do. Been using for 8 weeks, twice a day, and I'm still not 100% sure about that. But temporary tightening, firmness is very evident. I'll keep purchasing...
customer_reviews.author: Blissfully Retired

customer_reviews.title: Love this - I use it nightly
customer_reviews.text: I love TruSkin! Give them a try, you won't regret it. I have slowly switched to them exclusively for skincare and use these products day and night: Eye gel, Vit C serum, retinol moisturizer and eye cream. My skin is softer, brighter and much more clear. This is probably my favorite product, as I use a thin layer all over my face and 1) my eyes look refreshed 2) my wrinkles are filling in and 2) my lips are full and so so moisturized!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great skin products
customer_reviews.text: These products are terrific! They feel great on your skin and don't cause any irritation, especially the Eye Gel around such a sensitive area. I appreciate that they don't have any (phony) fragrance, to which I would most likely react. I would highly recommend trying their products. I also really like their serums. AND, their prices are so reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S.

customer_reviews.title: Softened stubborn undereye wrinkle
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that it minimized the puffy deep set undereye line I have had since forever.. it also softens and brightens the inner eye area near my nose, feels refreshing and non greasy, I noticed a difference within 3 days of using this product, I am nearly 50, non smoker, also reco the C serum it brightens my face.
customer_reviews.author: moltenmaven

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love TruSkin products, and they work! And the only reason I gave this 4 stars, is because the eye gel didn't work so well for me, personally.. However, the seller was so kind and offered to send me, as a gift, a bottle of TruSkin under eye cream to try. Thanks so much Erica! I give 5 STARS for your excellent service and communication!
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: My skin continues to improve.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the TruSkin products for a while now, and I have to say that I really like them all. My skin continues to improve and I'm very happy with the results! I'll continue to buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I notice a big difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 2 months now and I have noticed a definite difference in my eye brightness. I don't look as tired as before. I use it every evening after I wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just an eye cream!! Moisturizing not greasy!
customer_reviews.text: I started off using it for my eyes but then realized it said you could use on your entire face. OMG this moisturized my face better than my face lotion and it didn't leave it greasy. It absorbed right in!! My face is incredibly dry right now because I've been using an acne cream. I honestly couldn't believe it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product!
customer_reviews.text: Am currently on my second jar. When I bought the first one I wasn't crazy about the way it felt on my skin and now I use it on my whole face. I used another top rated eye gel in between and it made me appreciate this one all the more. Makes my face feel and look smoother and I do believe it is helping with the fine lines around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: MyGirlsMom

customer_reviews.title: You can feel the cooling effect
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the under eye products I have used over the years this is the first one I have bought a second time. I have issues with puffiness and dark circles and this product does help
customer_reviews.author: Carole Uhlenhop

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see any huge difference using this product. TruSkln makes other eye products that are better. And I particularly did not like the delivery system for this eye cream. It's messy and wasteful. I will not purchase this one again although I do like many other TruSkin products.
customer_reviews.author: Tualatinsue

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Dries quickly so I can put on my concealer. I use eye cream at night and this in the morning on upper lid and under eye. I’m 50% Italian (41yrs) so I don’t expect my dark circles to disappear, but I do notice decreased puffiness and firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of three

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand but this one is not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand but this one was simply too powerful
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this for an all-around moisturizer for my whole face. It didn't particularly do anything for around my eyes, but I have pretty bad skin. Using this along with their C-plus serum is a great combination for my face! My skin looks brighter and a bit younger. I didn't think anything could do that!!!
customer_reviews.author: kms

customer_reviews.title: Great Results!
customer_reviews.text: This eye gel works great, and it's a super cool and fun dispenser. I love it! It really does lessen the lines around my eyes and helps to puff them up a little. I use it in the morning before I put on my make-up then use the eye cream at night.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love this eye gel!
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye gel! I ordered the smaller bottle first and loved it so much I ordered the large one! I will always use this and feel it makes a definite difference in my fine lines!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't purchase, it's a gimmick!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't do what it says it does. I've been using this for 2 months and I haven't seen any changes in regards to my puffy eyes or dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Wendysmf

customer_reviews.title: I am 73 and have no bags or dark circles
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily -- it says can be used only on eyes or on entire face -- which I do. I am going to order one now because I am almost out. It disappears into one's skin -- its a serum -- I think it is effective.
customer_reviews.author: GHan

customer_reviews.title: Best eye gel ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best eye gel ever! Friends asking me what are you using....TruSkin Eye Gel. Recommending this product to ALL MY FRIENDS. This latest purchase was a gift to a friend. Not to mention as a night gel it has lightened dark spots ...bonus.
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: This is the best eye gel or cream that I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye gel or cream that I have ever used. I have small wrinkles under my eyes and dark circles, and this product has helped alleviate my "problem areas" when I use it. You can also use it as a spot treatment for other areas of your face. The press pump on the top of the comtanier is pretty cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It actually works
customer_reviews.text: I have tried numerous eye gels and creams, but this one is the best so far. The fine lines on my eyelids have decreased, my skin is firmer overall. I can't believe it does what it says it will do. About to place my second order as it is now a staple in my beauty regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Elles916

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: It reduces my dark circles under my eyes and puffiness. You must apply twice daily to see results.
customer_reviews.author: jason hardy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for the price and amount of product you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price and amount of product you get, and I love the push dispenser top. It doesn’t immediately take away the puffiness and dark circles but I have noticed an improvement after using it for the last week. I even keep it in the fridge and it feels amazing when I put it on!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I use to be in the beauty business and have used lots if skin care products and am fairly familiar with ingredients. This eye gel Includes collagen stimulating peptides In a very gentle base. I use it around my eyes for puffiness and mouth area for lines. Sometimes all over my face. It is very pure.
customer_reviews.author: Caligirl

customer_reviews.title: and I do like it. A little bit seems to go a ...
customer_reviews.text: The container top was broken when I opened package. I have tried it about a week, and I do like it. A little bit seems to go a long way, and It feels great under my eyes. I just hope next time I order, container is not broken.
customer_reviews.author: LYNDSAY J. MONTERROSO

customer_reviews.title: I love all their products
customer_reviews.text: I love all their products, they have made a noticeable difference to my skin in just 1 month of use. I use this one on my eyes and around my chin and neck area. My eyes look younger and not tired (must be lifting some sagging). Also does a great job with the under my chin and my neck, it visibly firmed the skin. They also have great customer service, and answered every email I wrote with helpful suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Sun J.

customer_reviews.title: So far, seems good
customer_reviews.text: Have only used about a week to 10 days, so I can't speak to the long term effects of this, but i do like the top dispenser and I like that this stuff isn't greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily's Mom

product_meta.title: Best Eye Gel for Wrinkles, Dark Circles, Under Eye Puffy Bags, Crepe Eyes, Super Eye Cream Moisturizer Serum for Men & Women - 1.7 fl oz
product_meta.description: Size:1.7 Fl OzMildly cooling on contact, this light weight intensive plant based anti wrinkle age defying facial skincare hydration formula rapidly penetrates skin cells to nourish and treat crows feet, with a concentrated blend of Botanical Hyaluronic Acid, Matrixyl 3000, Healing Natural Aloe Vera, Organic Cucumber Hydrosol, moisturizing MSM, firming Vegan Silk Amino Acids and Advanced Peptides.
feature_bullets: AWAKEN TIRED & PUFFY EYES - Lightweight gel glides smoothly on face for an instant cool and pure refreshing feel. Use alone or with your other cosmetics morning, daily, and night time while you sleep to minimize wrinkles, stimulate collagen and renew that beautiful ageless brightening and restore your all amazing healthy look and lift your flawless younger bright glow. Use undereyes and around eye areas, under makeup, concealer and serums.

UNIQUE FORMULATION - Designed as an active antiaging restorative renewing undereye treatment to penetrate deep to naturally protect, smooth, firm, repair, reduce, and tighten crow's feet, dark circle, and fine line concerns. Addresses every single eye area concern possible including dark circles, eye bags, puffy eyes, wrinkles, under eye sagging, puffiness, loss of firmness, crows feet, fine lines, loss of tone and resilience.
WHAT ARE CUSTOMERS SAYING - "Glowing complexion", "The Youthful Eyecream", "Treats Winkles", "Antiwrinkles treatments that work"
Leaping Bunny certified CRUELTY FREE. Formulated and bottled in the USA.

EXTENDED MANUFACTURER GUARANTEE - Love it or your money back! We understand it can take some experimentation to find just the right product for your unique skincare needs. If for any reason you decide this product isn't a good fit for your skin, we offer a 90-day money-back refund. No questions asked (in fact, you don't even have to return the bottle).
